title: Decline a Life Insurance Application
description: An underwriter has reviewed an application and must decline it due to significant health risks.

tasks.description: Review all application details, medical records, and exam results.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter confirms that the applicant's health history presents a risk outside of the company's guidelines.

tasks.description: Document the specific reason for the declination in the underwriting file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter clearly and accurately documents the reasons for the adverse decision.

tasks.description: Send a formal declination letter to the applicant that complies with all regulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legally compliant letter is sent to the applicant informing them of the decision.
